description: Episode of Series "Mirror of Germany. The German Scene = Deutschland Spiegel". Magazine items: Fire brigade display at Brunswick Airport; the 7th German Aviation Show in Hanover as part of the great German Industries Fair now in its 22nd year; celebration of Labour Day, May 1st; a visit to the Black Forest; better milk supplies for Essen; a new "Pop-in" discotheque; in Munich a young graphic artist causes great interest; at Ausburg Sports Hall the finals of the West European Volley Ball Cup are played.
